com.salesforce.androidsdk.phonegap.ui

Class SalesforceDroidGapActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • CordovaActivity
      • com.salesforce.androidsdk.phonegap.ui.SalesforceDroidGapActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SalesforceActivityInterface

    public class SalesforceDroidGapActivity
extends CordovaActivity
implements SalesforceActivityInterface
    Class that defines the main activity for a PhoneGap-based application.

      • refresh

        public void refresh(java.lang.String url)
        If an action causes a redirect to the login page, this method will be called. It causes the session to be refreshed and reloads url through the front door.
        Parameters:
        url - the page to load once the session has been refreshed.

        Returns the front-doored URL of a URL passed in.
        Parameters:

        isAbsUrl - True - if the URL should be used as is, False - otherwise.

        Front-doored URL.
